prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon with a rainbow of colors and powerful wings.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of fire and light.
Generate a mythical creature that soars high with vibrant red and yellow feathers.
Make a stunning Pokemon that represents hope, featuring a golden beak and tail.
Imagine a powerful flying-type Pokemon with a fiery aura and radiant plumage.
Design a Pokemon that guards the skies, showcasing brilliant colors and divine presence.
Give me an elegant bird Pokemon with striking colors, known for its healing abilities.
